üìú Who am I?

I am a self-taught software developer with 4 years of professional experience facilitating engineering solutions with a wide range of technical skills. Using my fullstack knowledge to create interactive applications

I began my career in Software Development after high school with an internship at IRAD Cameroon, a public administrative institution focused on scientific research and agricultural development. Building various software products and rendering IT services at the institute.

After completing my internship, I received a scholarship covering 80% of my tuition to study Computer Science at Webster University in Geneva, Switzerland. However, due to a family tragedy and the economic impact of the COVID-19 pandemic, I was forced to drop out as I could not afford the 20% tuition not covered by my scholarship and amounting to 7200CHF a year. Despite this setback, I decided to take on freelance work to support myself and continue building my skills.

What is my work
experience?

üë®‚Äçüîß Work History

Internship At IRAD Cameroon

During my internship at IRAD, I was responsible for building a library management system using HTML, CSS, Node.js, and Bootstra; as well as maintaining the organization's internet network and maintanance of IT devices.

Katiopa NightClub

From June 2020 to August 2020, I worked with a nightclub in Geneva called Katiopa. I was incharge of building their website and inventory management software. Also, I set up their security cameras/security-system and installed all of their electrical/sound devices.

Crypto

I then ventured into blockchain development, building a crypto staking platform called Spartacus and an NFT game called Rumble Kong League. I continued to work on various crypto development projects throughout the year, including a chatbot for a project called openaiERC20 and custom smart contract. Recently, I worked on a crowdfunding platform called Swider using WordPress.
